channel.title: VSCode on mpostument.com
channel.description: Recent content in VSCode on mpostument.com

item.title: Ansible Vault
item.description: Fifth article in series about ansible. In this article, I will show how to store securely store sensitive data in ansible

item.title: Ansible Role
item.description: Fourth article in series about ansible. In this article, I will what is roles and how to use them

item.title: Ansible Playbook
item.description: Third article in series about ansible. In this article, I will show how to use a playbook to create reusable code

item.title: Ansible Inventory
item.description: Second article in series about ansible. In this article, I will show how to use static and dynamic ansible inventory

item.title: Manage Ansible Versions With pyenv
item.description: First article in series about ansible. In this article, i will show install pyenv, create virtualenv and install the required ansible version

item.title: Terraform Modules and Import
item.description: Ninth article in series about terraform. In this article, I will show how to import existing resources into state and create modules

item.title: Terraform Condition and Lookup
item.description: Eights article in series about terraform. In this article, I will show how to use conditions and lookups in terraform

item.title: Terraform Variables
item.description: Sixth article in series about terraform. In this article, i will show how to use lifecycle and outputs in terraform

item.title: Terraform Lifecycle and Outputs
item.description: Sixth article in series about terraform. In this article i will show how to use lifecycle and outputs in terraform

item.title: Terraform Dynamic
item.description: Fifth article in series about terraform. In this article i will show how to dynamic in terraform

item.title: Terraform Template
item.description: Fourth article in series about terraform. In this article i will show how to use file and templates in terraform

item.title: Terraform State
item.description: Third article in series about terraform. In this article i will show how to use terraform state

item.title: Terraform Basics
item.description: Second article in series about terraform. In this article i will show install terraform provider and create AWS EC2 using terraform

item.title: Manage terraform with tfenv
item.description: First article in series about terraform. In this article i will show how to manager terraform with tfenv and how to configure VSCode for work with terraform
